name: LocalSiren
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: local siren
des: You can use Local Siren to ask questions about the business and get verified answers. Local Siren is a internet marketing_service located in San Clemente CA. After the Welcome message, you can ask questions like What's is your phone number, What's your address, tell me more about the business.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
